tab1.text1:
Welcome to La Zone, a PVE Server (soon a cluster when new maps get released)!

 ADMINS:
- Seah
- Ferrero Rog√©
- Grain

 RATES:
- Taming, Harvest x5
- EXP x2
- Breeding BOOSTED


Due to removing EngramUnlocker you may have negative engram points
Ask an admin to get a FREE Mindwipe Tonic!
 I also recommend you to join the discord
tab1.text2:
1. Basics.. respect others players and their stuff, no insult, shaming, harrassment!

 2. One base per tribe, no matter what

 3. Don't let traps & pen in wilderness !

 4. Report issues by submiting a Ticket on Discord! 

 5. Don't put your base on POI (Explorer Note, Resources Spot, Drop spots...etc) 

 6. This is a PVE server, no stealing nor killing ! 


 Most importantly Enjoy Playing with us :D
